top_comments.comment: Fun fact: that Naval Piranha easter egg is referenced in Yoshi's Woolly World. In that game you can still throw an egg (or a yarn ball I guess) at it and Kamek will react the same way. But he'll still make you fight him.
“OH, MY!” Is still the funniest thing

comments_since_last_sample.body: The cat easter egg was creepy af

How many times is someone gonna bring up Naval Piranha?

How about a boss shortcut no one brings up much like defeating Kalle Demos from Wind Waker with a bottle of water?

"super secret Easter Eggs"

"..you can find these obvious, blatant The Shining references peppered throughout Layers of Fear 2 by playing normally"
